review: As my local friend says, this is where you can get the best pizza in Ljubljana, and I guess he is right!!! The pizza was very delicious, and the service was really nice, I was served by a young attentive waiter who is extremely professional and efficient and kind. Will definitely come back again!! Thx for the wonderful experience!!
Very funny to say that I have travelled from the UK to come and find the best pizza I ever had so far and only cost me under £10.
Lots of choice for vegetarian and at least one vegan option. 'Tofu' pizza was vegan and was really nice! Loved the dough too! Servers were lovely too and definitely made up for the wet weather.

This place has a pretty cool vibe. Pizza is apparently according to reviews best in Slovenia, so we will be back for dinner. But now just a wine. The decor is funky with great lighting. Service was pleasant and friendly.

We ordered 2 gluten free pizzas which you pay extra 2€ for and tartar sauce that they forgot to give us… when we got home the pizzas were too small, which they didn't mention that they will be any smaller than the regular ones… after I …

I got charged for a small pizza 11.40€ plus extra for non-gluten dough and vegan cheese. Seen from the picture the size of pizza is not big enough even for a small child, very disappointing and actually disrespectful.

I liked my lunch experience here. I think the atmosphere is cool, with various interesting songs being played, while you are munching on your pizza. I think the taste of the pizza is pretty good, and you can grab yourself a salad and soup too, with študentski boni.

I'm a massive pizza fan! The pizza was almost great, massive need for better quality pizza toppings. The tomatoes were very watery and tasteless. Smaller cherry tomatoes would be better. I understand it's winter. My wife's pizza only had 3 …
10/10 for this place. All the pizzas and salad were delicious. Including the Gluten free options. Freezing cold beer, awesome 80s music and extremely friendly staff. Highly recommended.

Pizza pizza time with wine and dines. The salad was half a gallon of goodness - I recommend the regular crust for the pizzas. Tip top there, but the gluten free needed longer in the fireside pizza box. Great price and tasty food.
